channel.title: Comments on: Why do you need additional privileges for truncate table compared to delete?
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Jazzy
item.dc:creator: Jazzy
item.description: This is excellent piece which is rare to find on net. Even MSDN doesn't clearly tells why we need alter permissions to truncate... Good article.
item.content:encoded: This is excellent piece which is rare to find on net. Even MSDN doesn’t clearly tells why we need alter permissions to truncate… Good article.
